title: Stationary + Card Question
content:
I have to design letterhead and business cards for someone and they have two address's that they want to show on each thing, so it is a bit awkward compared to a standard letterhead and card.   
   
I was wondering if anyone has had to do this before or knew of any examples online that may give me some ideas on how I could layout this much information on these pieces. Any advice would be much appretiated.   
   
Thanks!
author: negativespace

comments.content:
Business Cards - one address on each side?   
   
Letterhead - addresses could be side by side or stacked vertically. Use a rule, some space or a bolder first line two separate the two.
